definition: to amass/to accumulate/to store/measured quantity (such as area of volume)/product (the result of multiplication)/to integrate (math.)/to solve (or integrate) an ordinary differential equation (math.)/old/long-standing
snow/snowfall/CL:場|场[chang2]/to have the appearance of snow/to wipe away, off or out/to clean

sentences.english: The bright surfaces of clouds and snow are revealed by moonlight.
sentences.chinese: 月光照映出明亮的白雲和積雪。

sentences.english: Firn is too big, the person that winds some is very sad without ticket.
sentences.chinese: 積雪太大，回有的的人沒有車票好難過。

sentences.english: Some larches are bent down by the weight of the snow.
sentences.chinese: 其中的一些落葉松被厚重的積雪壓倒了。

sentences.english: Taking the garbage out and keeping the sidewalk shoveled.
sentences.chinese: 垃圾倒掉，人行道上的積雪鏟走。

sentences.english: At this time, the small grouses drill into the marsh land early in the snow.
sentences.chinese: 這時候，小松雞們早鑽入窪地的積雪裏。

sentences.english: Nothing alive, only snow and the sun.
sentences.chinese: 這裏沒有其他生物，只有積雪和太陽。

sentences.english: Chicago endured blizzard conditions and thundersnow, along with half a meter of snow accumulation.
sentences.chinese: 芝加哥處於暴風雪和雷暴天氣，會有半米左右的積雪。

sentences.english: Thus it is doubted as the snow unmelted through winter.
sentences.chinese: 人們懷疑那是未融的積雪停駐在冬天。

sentences.english: In Wisconsin, ten inches of snow could fall.
sentences.chinese: 而在威斯康星，積雪竟達10英寸厚。

sentences.english: The snow peaked Fujiyama is the trademark of Japan.
sentences.chinese: 積雪蓋頂的富士山是日本的標誌。

sentences.english: Occasionally heard "creak" A snow pressure to cut off the branches.
sentences.chinese: 偶爾會傳來“咯吱”一聲，積雪把樹枝壓斷了。

sentences.english: The oil station collapsed due to heavy snows.
sentences.chinese: 整個油站因抵受不住重重的積雪而倒塌。

sentences.english: In winter the snow on the road packs down and makes driving dangerous.
sentences.chinese: 冬天，路上積雪變的很結實，使開車很危險。

sentences.english: Objective To determine the content of asiaticoside in Jixuedai tablet by thin lay chromatography scanning(TLC-scanning).
sentences.chinese: 目的採用薄層掃描法測定積雪甙片中積雪草苷的含量。

sentences.english: Objective To determine the content of asiaticoside in Jixuedai tablet by thin lay chromatography scanning(TLC-scanning).
sentences.chinese: 目的採用薄層掃描法測定積雪甙片中積雪草苷的含量。

sentences.english: The snow is even with the window.

definition: continuous/unbroken/uninterrupted/extending forever into the distance (of mountain range, river etc)
brilliant white snow cover (esp. of distant peaks)
wind and rain/the elements/trials and hardships
to freeze/to feel very cold/aspic or jelly
